H0.text: Kelly Jones, Richard Jones and Richard Cable founded which group. Feeder

H1.text: Kelly Jones, Richard Jones and Richard Cable founded which group. Super Furry Animals

H2.text: Kelly Jones, Richard Jones and Richard Cable founded which group. Manic Street Preachers

H3.text: Kelly Jones, Richard Jones and Richard Cable founded which group. Stereophonics

A4.text: Kelly, Richard and Cable began writing and performing music in working men's clubs together in 1992 as a band known as 'Tragic Love Company'.

A5.text: The band agreed to change their name to 'the Stereophonics'.
